entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 then light this afternoon. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:35 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
